headline: Synchrony and Planet DDS Expand Strategic Partnership to Integrate CareCredit Across Leading Dental Practice Management Platforms
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financial services company, today announced an expanded strategic partnership with Planet DDS that helps orthodontic and dental practices simplify patient financing and makes it easier for patients to move forward with care.

content.title: Synchrony and Planet DDS Expand Strategic Partnership to Integrate CareCredit Across Leading Dental Practice Management Platforms
content.summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financial services company, today announced an expanded strategic partnership with Planet DDS that helps orthodontic and dental practices simplify patient financing and makes it easier for patients to move forward with care.

thumbnail.caption: To further its mission to better serve Americans through financial education and transparency, Synchrony, and its leading health and wellness financial solution, CareCredit, today launched a new initiative: the Fair Financing Principles. (PRNewsfoto/Synchrony)
